author: Simon Difford
description: Black tea tannins and sour citrus juice balance rich fruit peach in this long rum and cognac-laced cocktail.
name: Peach Tea
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
30 ml Brewed cold black breakfast tea
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
